alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Douglas; Kandiyohi; Lac Qui Parle; Pope; Stevens; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 8:46PM CST until March 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...SNOW MOVES IN TUESDAY EVENING AND LAST INTO WEDNESDAY... A band of snow will move in to west central Minnesota Tuesday evening, and spread across the state into northern Wisconsin Tuesday night into Wednesday. Most locations within this band of snow will see 2 to 5 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, with total accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Plan on extra travel time. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota.
